original_text: “Our father died in the wilderness. He was not among Korah’s followers, who banded together against the Lord, but he died for his own sin and left no sons.
korean_text: 우리 아버지가 광야에서 죽었으나 여호와를 거슬러 모인 고라의 무리에 들지 아니하고 자기 죄로 죽었고 아들이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: Our father died in the wilderness.
He was not among Korah's followers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 고라의 무리 중에 있지 않았으며,

sentences.original_text: who banded together against the Lord,
but he died for his own sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자신의 죄 때문에 죽었습니다
